name: Get Out Of Debt Simulator LUDUM DARE 52
name_original: Get Out Of Debt Simulator LUDUM DARE 52
description:
You're 15,000 dollars in debt! The only way to get rid of it? Hard work and labor! Harvest crops to gain cash and buy land to harvest even more crops!

Controls:

WASD to move

LMB to use your scythe

Tools used:

Aseprite

Godot Engine

PiXel ScaLer
